Room.Name: Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the end of a long hallway ending in a door on the east wall.
Room.LongDescription: The long hallway runs south from here. On the east wall is a relatively unremarkable door with a silver lock on it. As you peek through the key- hole, you can see the door enters a large room approximately fifty meters wide. Something is moving inside, but you can't tell what it is in the darkness.
